data.communities:
Years ago in several bars and coffeeshops during the groovebot
    project
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Tk::Playlist is part of a project I embarked on 5 years ago (and
    have maintained a little bit here or there since), a database-driven
    networked music server with a Tk client-side interface. Tonight, I
    was looking through my old code, thinking about refitting the
    project for public release, when I realized that this little bit of
    useful code was easily to split out of the main tree. So here it is,
    I hope you like it.
